entry.name: Command Group Length
entry.description: The even number of bytes from the end of the value field to the beginning of the next group.

entry.name: Affected SOP Class UID
entry.description: The affected SOP Class UID associated with the operation.

entry.name: Requested SOP Class UID
entry.description: The requested SOP Class UID associated with the operation.

entry.name: Command Field
entry.description: This field distinguishes the DIMSE operation conveyed by this Message. This field shall be set to one of the following values: 0001H C-STORE-RQ 8001H C-STORE-RSP 0010H C-GET-RQ 8010H C-GET-RSP 0020H C-FIND-RQ 8020H C-FIND-RSP 0021H C-MOVE-RQ 8021H C-MOVE-RSP 0030H C-ECHO-RQ 8030H C-ECHO-RSP 0100H N-EVENT-REPORT-RQ 8100H N-EVENT-REPORT-RSP 0110H N-GET-RQ 8110H N-GET-RSP 0120H N-SET-RQ 8120H N-SET-RSP 0130H N-ACTION-RQ 8130H N-ACTION-RSP 0140H N-CREATE-RQ 8140H N-CREATE-RSP 0150H N-DELETE-RQ 8150H N-DELETE-RSP 0FFFH C-CANCEL-RQ

entry.name: Message ID
entry.description: Implementation-specific value that distinguishes this Message from other Messages.

entry.name: Message ID Being Responded To
entry.description: Shall be set to the value of the Message ID (0000,0110) field used in associated request Message.

entry.name: Move Destination
entry.description: Shall be set to the DICOM AE Title of the destination DICOM AE to which the C-STORE sub-operations are being performed.

entry.name: Priority
entry.description: The priority shall be set to one of the following values: LOW = 0002H MEDIUM = 0000H HIGH = 0001H

entry.name: Command Data Set Type
entry.description: This field indicates if a Data Set is present in the Message. This field shall be set to the value of 0101H if no Data Set is present; any other value indicates a Data Set is included in the Message.

entry.name: Status
entry.description: Confirmation status of the operation. See Annex C.

entry.name: Offending Element
entry.description: If status is Cxxx, then this field contains a list of the elements in which the error was detected.

entry.name: Error Comment
entry.description: This field contains an application-specific text description of the error detected.

entry.name: Error ID
entry.description: This field shall optionally contain an application-specific error code.

entry.name: Affected SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Contains the UID of the SOP Instance for which this operation occurred.

entry.name: Requested SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Contains the UID of the SOP Instance for which this operation occurred.

entry.name: Event Type ID
entry.description: Values for this field are application-specific.

entry.name: Attribute Identifier List
entry.description: This field contains an Attribute Tag for each of the n Attributes applicable.

entry.name: Action Type ID
entry.description: Values for this field are application-specific.

entry.name: Number of Remaining Sub-operations
entry.description: The number of remaining C-STORE sub-operations to be invoked for the operation.

entry.name: Number of Completed Sub-operations
entry.description: The number of C-STORE sub-operations associated with this operation that have completed successfully.

entry.name: Number of Failed Sub-operations
entry.description: The number of C-STORE sub-operations associated with this operation that have failed.

entry.name: Number of Warning Sub-operations
entry.description: The number of C-STORE sub-operations associated with this operation that generated warning responses.

entry.name: Move Originator Application Entity Title
entry.description: Contains the DICOM AE Title of the DICOM AE that invoked the C-MOVE operation from which this C-STORE sub-operation is being performed.

entry.name: Move Originator Message ID
entry.description: Contains the Message ID (0000,0110) of the C-MOVE-RQ Message from which this C-STORE sub-operation is being performed.
